title: The FocusNode
subtitle: The state and lifecycle of a focusable widget.
leftBullets: A FocusNode is an object used by a stateful widget to obtain keyboard focus and handle keyboard events.
It represents the focus state of a widget. You can ask it for focus, listen to its changes, and more.
Crucially, a FocusNode is a long-lived object. You must create it in `initState` and clean it up in the `dispose` method to prevent memory leaks.
